comprehensive_overview: Atropos is a software tool designed for read trimming and adapter detection in Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) data. It aims to accurately identify and remove adapter sequences, poly-A tails, and other types of unwanted sequences from NGS reads.
core_features:
1. Adapter detection and trimming
2. Quality filtering and read trimming
3. Support for multiple sequencing platforms
4. Parallel processing for improved efficiency
